TopicTitle: How can I ignite complex ION engines (RO,RSS)

Articles.Content: I can ignite simple ION engines because they only need only one propellant. But the complex ones with higher thrust need additionally megajoules. How can I produce megajoules ? When I try to ignite engine it says "Megajoules deprived".
im pretty sure ur not using stock. megajoules sounds like a KSPI thing and i'm pretty sure it is. i can only answer questions about stock gameplay.

You need a power source that produces Megajoules. Look through your available power production methods for ones that do. If you cannot find any, you will need to research them first (assuming you are not in sandbox mode in the first place).
